TaskStatus.name: TaskStatus
TaskStatus.description: Represents the status of a task, such as Not Started, Completed, or Closed.

ApiName.description: Uniquely identifies a picklist value so it can be retrieved without using an ID or master label.

IsClosed.description: Indicates whether this task status value represents a closed task (true) or not (false). Multiple task status values can represent a closed task.

IsDefault.description: Indicates whether the status is the default task status value (true) or not (false) in the picklist.

MasterLabel.description: Master label for this task status value. This display value is the internal label that doesn’t get translated. Limit: 255 characters.

SortOrder.description: Number used to sort this value in the task status picklist. These numbers aren’t guaranteed to be sequential, as some previous task status values might have been deleted.

TaskStatus.accessRules: Customer Portal users can't access this object.
